channel.title: The DRT dev project please people from project ripzone do not post here
channel.description:
Come to DRT Scape New Forums, A lot better then RipZone...We have fair Admins and will only accept people to be Admin after they have earn't trust and prove to be fair, not just say they will be. This Forum will be slightly like Mopar with our own private server/server's. You will also be able to advertise your own server whether it is Hamachi or No-IP but you have to have posted a certain amount (just so noobs don't come post their servers just to advertise but are not ever on forums.) before being allowed to do so.
Admin/Owners are:
Dha12oks Awesom Ricky James
Also we are working on a DRTscape server if you'd like to apply post here also here's the signup format.
Age experiance what job do you want will you listen to the owners will you report all rule breakers
Coder's! -ricky james -dh12roks -awsom - -
Tester's - - - - -
client coder's(maybe) - - - - -
Server hoster. ricky james
[br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2007, 09:37:05 PM[/size][hr]Also pm me and ill tell the website
